attributes.action: Ignore the request for a 2nd referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The result of 23rd of June which has upset the bremain voters have initiated a petition to get the government to look at possibily holding a second referendum. The UK voted to leave the European Union and thus that result should be final and the government should NOT even consider this request from bremain voters.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to ignore the request of a 2nd public referendum vote and accept the result from the 23rd of June votes as final.
